function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases in an interconnected world.","Impact":"Potential for widespread disease, panic, mental illness, and death.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce disease transmission and panic through public health protocols and education.","Technologies":"Wireless technology for contact tracing and real-time disease monitoring.","People":"Societies, communities, and individuals in interconnected environments.","Owner":"Public health organizations and government authorities."}]}
